content: materials - 9 11 skeins of purl soho s alpaca pure 1 100% alpaca approximately 980 1165 yards required this color is timeless navy - us 9 5 5 mm 32-inch or longer circular needles 3 - us 8 5 mm 16- or 20-inch circular needles - a set of us 6 4 mm double pointed needles 4 - 4 stitch markers 5 gauge 16 stitches and 36 row = 4 inches with larger circular needles in woven slip_stitch pattern blocked 20 stitches and 24 row = 4 inches with smaller circular needles in 2x2 rib relaxed sizes to fit chest circumference 30 38 inches 38 46 inches - finished circumference at bottom edge 60 66 inches - finished length from high point of shoulder to bottom edge 22¼ 24 inches - finished neck circumference 17 19½ inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/alpaca-pure 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
